title: Asia Album: Pakistan's diverse culture on display at Lok Mela Festival
content:
Artists perform during the Lok Mela Festival in Islamabad, capital of Pakistan on Nov. 8, 2020. (Xinhua/Ahmad Kamal)
ISLAMABAD, Nov. 10 (Xinhua) -- Pakistan celebrated the diverse culture and traditions of the country during the folk festival known as Lok Mela, providing a platform for the craft people to present their artistic works and for folk artists to display their performances.   
An artist draws a painting at his stall during the Lok Mela Festival in Islamabad, capital of Pakistan on Nov. 8, 2020. (Xinhua/Ahmad Kamal)
An artist performs during the Lok Mela Festival in Islamabad, capital of Pakistan on Nov. 8, 2020. (Xinhua/Ahmad Kamal)
A boy learns to make pottery during the Lok Mela Festival in Islamabad, capital of Pakistan on Nov. 8, 2020. (Xinhua/Ahmad Kamal)
A Pakistani woman spins cotton to prepare traditional clothes at the Lok Mela Festival in Islamabad, capital of Pakistan on Nov. 8, 2020. (Xinhua/Ahmad Kamal) 
An artist carves at his stall during the Lok Mela Festival in Islamabad, capital of Pakistan on Nov. 8, 2020. (Xinhua/Ahmad Kamal)
An artist carves at his stall during the Lok Mela Festival in Islamabad, capital of Pakistan on Nov. 8, 2020. (Xinhua/Ahmad Kamal)
